description:
The Wieand Law Firm is focused on protecting the rights of innocent victims who were injured in accidents or through malpractice in Pennsylvania and neighboring New Jersey. We are proud to serve clients at four office locations, including Plymouth Meeting, which allow us to provide convenient service to all the residents of Southeastern Pennsylvania.

Wieand Law Firm clients receive personalized legal service from founding attorney, Brent Wieand. We focus on civil litigation with an emphasis on personal injury law. In addition to helping countless families overcome the challenges that often accompany unexpected injuries and losses, we also represent clients in matters related to civil rights and employee rights violations.

Whether your legal need stems from a recent motor vehicle accident or another civil matter, you can turn to the Wieand Law Firm for the assistance you need to pursue justice. We will carefully examine the details of your situation and explain your legal options, so you can make informed decisions about taking action. By scheduling a free initial consultation at our law office in Plymouth Meeting, you can learn more about how we can help you.
